projects.title: DevAlign
projects.description: DevAlign is an AI-powered Human Resource Information System (HRIS) specifically designed to revolutionize IT project allocation in Indonesia's software industry. Built to address the critical challenge of high employee turnover (20-35% annually) caused by skill-role mismatches, DevAlign leverages artificial intelligence and data analytics to match the right people with the right projects.

pages.heading: Project Overview
pages.text: DevAlign is an AI-driven Human Resource Information System (HRIS) built to transform how IT projects are staffed within Indonesia’s software industry. Addressing the industry’s high annual turnover rate of 20–35%, largely driven by mismatches between employee skills and project requirements, DevAlign uses advanced AI and data analytics to ensure the right talent is placed on the right projects. The result is smarter allocation, stronger team performance, and a more sustainable workforce.

contributions.label: Frontend
tasks: Built UI components
Integrated GraphQL

contributions.label: Backend
tasks: Designed DB model
Created REST/GraphQL API

pages.heading: The Challenge
pages.text: The wrong people are too often placed on the wrong projects, creating misalignment, stalled progress, and unnecessary frustration across teams.
list: Misaligned Skills and Roles – Employees are assigned to projects that don’t match their true capabilities.
Inefficient Use of Talent – Resources are spread thin or underutilized due to guesswork-based allocation.
Increased Turnover & Costs – Poor project fit leads to disengagement, burnout, and higher replacement expenses.

pages.heading: The Solution
pages.text: We introduced an AI-powered HRIS that intelligently matches people to projects based on real data—skills, experience, certifications, and workload—ensuring every assignment is a strategic fit.
list: AI-Generated Employee Profiles – Automatically track skills, tech stacks, certifications, achievements, and experience history.
Smart Project Matching Engine – Recommends or auto-assigns employees to projects using skill compatibility, availability, and workload balance.
Integrated Workflow Tools – Kanban boards and collaboration features streamline task visibility and team coordination.

pages.heading: Expected Impact
grid: Increased project success rates through optimal skill–project matching
Higher employee satisfaction and reduced turnover
More efficient utilization of talent and time

projects.title: TixPlaza
projects.description: TixPlaza is an online ticket booking platform that allows users to browse, select, and purchase tickets for various events such as concerts, sports, and theater performances. Built with Nuxt.js, and MySql, TixPlaza offers a seamless user experience with real-time seat selection, secure payment processing, and personalized event recommendations.

pages.heading: Overview
pages.text: TixPlaza is an online ticket booking platform that allows users to browse, select, and purchase tickets for various events such as concerts, sports, and theater performances. Built with Nuxt.js, and MySql, TixPlaza offers a seamless user experience with real-time seat selection, secure payment processing, and personalized event recommendations.

tasks: Developed responsive UI components using Nuxt.js and TailwindCSS
Implemented real-time seat selection interface with dynamic state updates

contributions.label: Backend

Containerized the backend environment using Docker for consistent deployment

projects.title: Moo Nonton
projects.description: Moo Nonton is a simple movie streaming website built as a practice project to revisit the fundamentals of front-end development. After frequently relying on TailwindCSS, this project was intentionally created to relearn and strengthen core CSS skills. Developed using React.js and vanilla CSS, it features movie listings from various genres and includes a wishlist system managed with Redux. This project was completed as part of the Web Development course at the Korean ASEAN Digital Academy.

projects.title: Math 4 Dumb
projects.description: This web aims to help students from elementary school to high school in learning math easily and fun. Because, on this web the material will be presented interactively and students can create discussion threads when facing difficult material so that it can be answered by other users. This web is built with Vue.js and Tailwind for the front-end. Then, using Express.js as a backend endpoint and MySql for database storage where storage includes account storage, material bookmarks, and discussion posts. And account security has also used Bcrypt, JWT, and Cookies.
